snippet.title: Noir Syndrome Trailer
snippet.description:
The game is available for purchase here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/299780

Check out the official game page here: http://www.glassknuckle.com/NoirSyndrome

Noir Syndrome is a procedurally generated Detective Murder-Mystery with a new story every time! Featuring smooth pixel art graphics by Dave Gedarovich and a jazzy noir soundtrack by Bombadeer Studios.

Follow Glass Knuckle Games:
http://www.glassknuckle.com
https://www.facebook.com/GlassKnuckleGames
https://www.twitter.com/glass_knuckle
